instruction: I am a Chinese citizen and I want to go to Macau to watch a concert recently, but I have not yet applied for a visa for Macau. I live in Futian District, Shenzhen City. I heard that Shenzhen currently has 24-hour self-service check-in machines. Please help me find the addresses of 5 24-hour self-service check-in machines in Futian District and save them in Chinese in this open word document.

minimal: `TYPING` 深圳福田区24小时自助签注机地址

`CLICK` on '深圳公安' (Shenzhen Public Security) official website or WeChat official account link if found in search results, looking for '出入境业务' (Exit-Entry Business) or '智能签注设备' (Intelligent Endorsement Equipment)
`TYPING` (Assuming you've found a map or list on the website/WeChat that shows locations.)
`CLICK` on the address of the first 24-hour self-service check-in machine in Futian District to highlight it
`CLICK` on the address of the second 24-hour self-service check-in machine in Futian District (switch back to Chrome window if needed, then copy)
`CLICK` on the address of the third 24-hour self-service check-in machine in Futian District (switch back to Chrome window if needed, then copy)
`CLICK` on the address of the fourth 24-hour self-service check-in machine in Futian District (switch back to Chrome window if needed, then copy)
`CLICK` on the address of the fifth 24-hour self-service check-in machine in Futian District (switch back to Chrome window if needed, then copy)
